    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()

      • grabAmmoTest

        public void grabAmmoTest()
        Check that the right squares are given to a player as a choice for a grab action. Check also that the grab af an ammo tile is correclty performed

      • grabWeaponTest

        public void grabWeaponTest()
        Check that the right squares are given to a player as a choice for a grab action. Check alst that only the weapon that a player can pay are showed for a grab action, and that a weapon grab is correctly performed

      • adrenalinicGrabTest

        public void adrenalinicGrabTest()
        Check that the correct squares are showed as target for a grab in case of adrenalinic grab

      • fourthWeaponGrabTest

        public void fourthWeaponGrabTest()
        Check that the grab of a fourth weapon is correcly managed. Weapon is correctly grabbed by the player, that the player have to discard one weapon. Check also that at the end of this operation the inventory of the player is correctly setupped

      • grabWeaponWithPowerUp

        public void grabWeaponWithPowerUp()
        Check that a weapon can be correcly grabbed with powerUps, and only the usable powerUps are given to the player for the pay choice
